mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ORDER WHERE ORDER_NO = CAST(#{orderNo} AS VARCHAR2(30))

SELECT PO.SERIAL_NO, PO.ORDER_QTY, PO.TOTAL_AMT, PO.ORDER_NO, PO.OPT_NO, P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, O.OPT_NAME, O.OPT_VALUE, O.OPT_ADD_PRICE, PA.THUMB_PATH || PA.SAVE_FILE_NAME AS THUMB_IMG, P.PROD_PRICE FROM TB_PRODUCT_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN TB_OPTION O ON PO.OPT_NO = O.OPT_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON O.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PROD_NO, THUMB_PATH, SAVE_FILE_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT_ATTACHMENT WHERE (PROD_NO, PROD_ATT_NO) IN ( SELECT PROD_NO, MIN(PROD_ATT_NO) FROM TB_PRODUCT_ATTACHMENT WHERE PROD_ATT_STATUS = 'Y' AND THUMB_PATH IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PROD_NO ) ) PA ON P.PROD_NO = PA.PROD_NO WHERE PO.ORDER_NO = CAST(#{orderNo} AS VARCHAR2(30)) ORDER BY PO.SERIAL_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ORDER SET REFUND_DATE = SYSDATE, REFUND_REASON = #{refundReason} WHERE ORDER_NO = CAST(#{orderNo} AS VARCHAR2(30))
